intro: Clutia stenophylla, commonly known as the narrow-leaf clutia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves that are usually narrow and pointed. It produces small, white or pale yellow flowers arranged in clusters, which are followed by small, round berries. Clutia stenophylla is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forest understories.
